title: "Lenskart acquires AI computer vision startup TangoEye"
excerpt: "Eyewear retailer Lenskart has acquired Chennai-based TangoEye, an AI-based computer vision startup, which analyses CCTV recordings of stores to provide analytics, optimise customer flow and ensure proper adherence to all processes."
